website_summaries.verdict: 16 oz. bubble reservoir so there is no need for constant refilling. Ideal when you needs lots of bubbles over a long time.
pros: The best detail is the large bubble reservoir and the high volume of bubbles produced
Electric unit so no need to purchase batteries
cons: Motor can get wet and there's the rare chance of a minor electric shock if not monitored

customer_reviews.title: Help!
customer_reviews.text: This is suppose to be a "professional" bubble blower, and it blows like a professional for about 10 mins tops, then we have to refill????? What are we doing wrong? We have seen several like this and they seem to go for hours. We have it bracket(ed) to the underside of gazebo. Should we have it housed in something to keep out of wind? I will attach pic because we really want to find out why it is only blowing bubbles for 10 mins.the pic is the first 10 mind. Then fewer and fewer bubble. If we plan a dinner party for 3 hours, that is 18 refills on the bubbles alone. I do not think it is correct.
customer_reviews.author: christa bolton

customer_reviews.title: I really wanted to like this product but it is in desperate need of ...
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to like this product but it is in desperate need of some engineering tweaks. The wands move too quickly and cut short bubble production. The fan is underpowered and can't blow many bubbles before the wands move out of the 'blow zone'. The fan looks to be a fan for computers and doesn't really have good output. Fix those two issues and it may be better. I ran this side by side with a gazillion bubbles machine and the gazillion out produced this 3 to 1 operating on same bubble solution..
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good machine, make your own solution or buy it cheap elsewhere
customer_reviews.text: This machine works well, however if you are using it continuously for hours, it uses a lot of bubble solution. Also, the machine stopped working after a month or so of daily use. I ran the machine for about 6 hours a day in the summer and used about 100ml of bubble solution. DO NOT BUY THE EXPENSIVE BUBBLE SOLUTION ONLINE. Not every bubble solution works in the machine. You can make your own using Dawn dish soap and distilled water (this works with the machine), or 5Below and Walmart sell 100ml bottles of bubble solution for under $5 in the summertime which is what I used.
customer_reviews.author: Moneeba

customer_reviews.title: I could not have been more pleased! I ordered this bubble machine for a VERY ...
customer_reviews.text: I could not have been more pleased! I ordered this bubble machine for a VERY VERY special event and I was not disappointed in the least! The machine put out TONS of bubbles and was EXTREMELY easy to refill! The bubbles are small but PLENTIFUL! Of course, wind direction will dictate the best placement for your event but this was a solid WINNER!!
customer_reviews.author: Aunt McDebby

customer_reviews.title: Bubbles galore!
customer_reviews.text: This was perfect for our one year old's "bubble" themed birthday party! She loved it, and so did all the kids, even 9-10 year olds! It creates a ton of bubbles and is perfect for a large area! We are looking forward to using it in our backyard this summer.
customer_reviews.author: Monica M.

customer_reviews.title: I have tried numerous types of bubble solution from the ...
customer_reviews.text: I have tried numerous types of bubble solution from the expensive to the cheap and it always ends up being foamy and not enough air pressure to blow continuous bubbles... Was really excited to get this "Professional" bubble blower and have a small plastic one from walmart that out does this one and it runs off of 3 triple A batteries... Really disappointed😟
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Tapp

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!!!!Do not hesitate to buy
customer_reviews.text: Great Product!!!!Do not hesitate to buy! It is nicely made and works as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great bubble machine overall
customer_reviews.text: This was a super great bubble blower for the kids. We had a party and they loved it. It does go through the liquid really fast so make sure to filler up. The only thing that I could improve upon with this machine is: it doesn’t really blow bubbles once the liquid is low in the basin. It has to be fairly full to produce bubbles. While this makes sense. It is a slight disappointment when you still have more bubble solution but not enough to make the bubbles still come out. My kids loved this machine as long as I was close by continually filling it up. Lol
customer_reviews.author: Staclkymae

customer_reviews.title: Mine has issues
customer_reviews.text: It drags and slows almost to a stop sometimes, very disappointing. I figure I may have just gotten one that has motor issues. When it works, it puts out an amazing amount of bubbles. I just had it for a long time before I opened it so I messed up by not checking it sooner.
customer_reviews.author: Carmen

customer_reviews.title: Not for outdoor use, splattered everywhere!!! Don’t waste your hard earned money!
customer_reviews.text: Worst purchase I’ve ever made from amazon, it needs a cover to prevent normal outside air circulation. I tried using this in my covered patio and it splattered everywhere!! I had more bubble juice on the floor than bubbles in the air. Mind you I live in area that doesn’t get much wind. I turned around and bought a bubble maker from Walmart that worked and produced ten times as many bubbles. Total disappointment!!!!
customer_reviews.author: mona hernandez

customer_reviews.title: Is there such a thing as too much bubbles?
customer_reviews.text: I think not! If you agree then you'll love this bad boy! It produces an ungodly amount of bubbles! My only regret is that I also bought the pro bubble formula suggested by amazon. It makes bubbles that are very strong and pop-resistant but also very heavy so they do not float well. The dollar store el cheapo bottle of bubbles works better in my opinion. Which is good because this monster goes through a lot of bubble juice. Buy the big bottles.
customer_reviews.author: jd williamson

customer_reviews.title: Best purchase for our kids
customer_reviews.text: Best purchase for our kids. We plug it in and let them play for hours with bubbles in the backyard.
customer_reviews.author: purplereign

customer_reviews.title: as it will be the perfect, earth friendly
customer_reviews.text: We haven't opened our package yet, but we went to a party two weeks ago and they had this machine! We instantly ordered it and can't wait to crack this baby open. We hope to order another one soon, as it will be the perfect, earth friendly, sendoff for our wedding! We can't wait to use it for our daughter's party this weekend! It is so much fun!
customer_reviews.author: Kaitlyn

customer_reviews.title: great device
customer_reviews.text: worked well I have done 3 shoots with it 2 maternity and one child shoot in both cases worked well and its light weight was a help when need to move it out of the way
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Redmond

customer_reviews.title: Buy a different one
customer_reviews.text: Splatters liquid every where. Spins at a very fast speed and not that many bubbles produced for the speed. Don’t bother buying. Buy a cheaper one and order two... better deal that way.
customer_reviews.author: Debi Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Worked great... until it didn't
customer_reviews.text: Worked great for quite a few months. Now when we turn it on, it'll blow bubbles for 5 seconds and then the fan will power down and not spin fast enough to get bubbles out. I've tried researching on how to fix this and have come up empty handed.
customer_reviews.author: Cord McConnell

customer_reviews.title: Money well spent!
customer_reviews.text: This summer we spent over 100 + dollars on bubble machines. My best friends mom told us about this machine and how great it was. Absolutely love it and well worth every penny!
customer_reviews.author: Tasha Swoape

customer_reviews.title: Works great.
customer_reviews.text: Worth it! I've bought about 5 cheap bubble machines and they always die after a month or two. This is holding up great and makes fantastic bubbles. You do need an outlet though!
customer_reviews.author: MomOf2

customer_reviews.title: Great product so far!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Creates many bubbles. Works so far 30 minutes of continuous use. For reference 1 of these creates a standard American patio deck full of bubbles. And also 2 happy kids.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Hours of bubble fun
customer_reviews.text: Love, love, love this bubble blower. Granted we have only used it once it is so much fun. It makes tons of bubbles. I just used the cheap-o bubble liquid from dollar store and it worked just fine. I hope to have this blower for years to come. I will keep you updated.
customer_reviews.author: Wanda

customer_reviews.title: Worked great while it worked
customer_reviews.text: Unit broke the first day we tried to use it. We bought the extended warranty offered through Amazon but that only becomes active after the manufacturer's warranty runs out. We've sent numerous emails to the manufacturer but have yet to get any responses. Worked great while it worked!
customer_reviews.author: Lynali

customer_reviews.title: Awesome for parties or just for the back yard!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is awesome for parties! Don't buy expensive bubbles they are too heavy! The cheaper bubbles float all over, the expensive bubbles just make a bubbly dance floor!
customer_reviews.author: Katie Morrison

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for outside
customer_reviews.text: This machine outs out a ton of bubbles. Perfect for outside, but too much output for indoors. The kids love this.
customer_reviews.author: Kresta Trujillo

customer_reviews.title: Bubbles got really foamy
customer_reviews.text: Would like to try again with the bubbles they recommend. Used other brand and the bubbles really stayed low to the ground and ended up a foamy mess after awhile. I do like the heavy duty nature of the machine and it all worked well, so I'm wondering if it was the bubbles.
customer_reviews.author: Molly R. Verock

customer_reviews.title: ... in haunted house in clown room it was a great hit tons of bubbles love it
customer_reviews.text: used in haunted house in clown room it was a great hit tons of bubbles love it
customer_reviews.author: kat

customer_reviews.title: have to buy 2 for a good
customer_reviews.text: it's ok gives lots of bubbles ,but the fan is too weak the bubbles don't go very far i, i used for my head start winter brake celebration and they had to be very close to the machine wich made me unconfortable. if you really want to have a blast! have to buy 2 for a good party
customer_reviews.author: Buenaventura Mcginty

customer_reviews.title: Bubbles everywhere!!!
customer_reviews.text: We really love to use this for our parades and family dance party!
customer_reviews.author: Minnie Mouse

customer_reviews.title: Fan defective.
customer_reviews.text: Appeared at be a nice machine, but the fan did not work. Returned it for a refund.
customer_reviews.author: sniedbalski

customer_reviews.title: Only downside is that the reserve that holds the bubbles leaks fairly easily and if you let it run for more than ...
customer_reviews.text: This was a big hit with our toddlers. Only downside is that the reserve that holds the bubbles leaks fairly easily and if you let it run for more than 30 minutes, it started to "foam bubble" so they just spilled out over the side instead of floating into the yard.
customer_reviews.author: lara

customer_reviews.title: Grandkids love this machine
customer_reviews.text: Grandkids love this machine. We had it on all summer. Even the pups chased bubbles. Great machine for parties. We used Gazillion bubbles from Walmart. Worked great. Cheap bubbles will be disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: linda parker

customer_reviews.title: This thing should be called an indoor unit. The ...
customer_reviews.text: This thing should be called an indoor unit.The fan is so weak, and the bubbles fall onto the ground within five feet of this thing. Would not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Real Good

customer_reviews.title: Could have been better
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy. High quality however it didn't fill the room with bubbles like expected. Maybe would have gotten better results if used high end bubbles. Very good price
customer_reviews.author: Jadyn

customer_reviews.title: got this for daughters bday party. Works as expected ...
customer_reviews.text: got this for daughters bday party. Works as expected. makes bubbles for her to have a bubble dance party. she loves it, and i would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Bms

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: All machines I bought worked one day during festival, then stuck...
customer_reviews.author: Wavebourn

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fun and reliable machine. It produced bubbles for three hours and didn't stop!
customer_reviews.author: Busy Mom

customer_reviews.title: I love this, but any unused bubbles need to be ...
customer_reviews.text: I love this, but any unused bubbles need to be removed or they do not work the next day.
customer_reviews.author: BER

customer_reviews.title: Love The bubble machine!!
customer_reviews.text: love this machine. Works great and entertains kids for hours.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: bubbles, bubbles bubbles, they are everywhere, even down the street. This machine does it.
customer_reviews.author: Drew

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Works great!! Must have for kids who love bubbles. Only down fall is how quick the bubbles run out.

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Did not give hardly any bubbles .. could have had more blowing myself.. disappointed
customer_reviews.author: sharon gorrin

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This thing is Amazing, so many bubbles, my son loves it. It just really eats up the bubble solution!
customer_reviews.author: Joshua T Staple

customer_reviews.title: IF YOU LOVE BUBBLES LIKE I DO....
customer_reviews.text: LOVE THE BUBBLE MACHINE.... JUST REMEMBER TO KEEP IT OILED WTH WD40.....I RUN THIS MACHINE HOURS ON END ALL THROUGH THE SUMMER

customer_reviews.title: my kids love it.
customer_reviews.text: The amount of bubbles was crazy, my kids love it.

customer_reviews.title: Not the best bubble machine
customer_reviews.text: Stopped working the 1st time we used it. Didn’t even have it on 30mins.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea Soto

customer_reviews.title: Kids and dogs love this. So many bubbles
customer_reviews.text: I have spent more on those bubble machines in the stores. Kids and dogs love this. So many bubbles.
customer_reviews.author: Cheri

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Doesn’t blow extreme bubbles and goes through solution super fast!

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: The small ones I bought from Wal Mart put out more bubbles.

customer_reviews.title: Super easy to use and tons of bubbles
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as described. Super easy to use and tons of bubbles. Used it for a kids birthday and it was a huge hit!

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works great and much more durable than the little ones from Walmart or target

customer_reviews.title: Extremely disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: Very flimsy, failed to work after 1 use. Extremely disappointed.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: A little smaller than I expected. Could have used two, but it worked well.

customer_reviews.title: Broken
customer_reviews.text: Both machines were broken. They don’t work. I’m not able to return.

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Not as good as I had hoped... Volume was severely lacking.

customer_reviews.title: don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: This worked for about a month & 1/2 and stopped working...don't waste your money! very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Used and broken
customer_reviews.text: I just received this item and it is used and the spinning wand does not spin. There are soap stains all down the side of it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: GREAT fun at a very affordable price. Perfect for kids that love BUBBLES!
customer_reviews.text: We set it up outside for a kids party and it was a HIT despite the fact that it was raining! The pro strength bubble formula is highly recommended - they make for much longer lasting bubbles though the bubbles are smaller. If you want bigger bubbles, water the solution down just a touch.
customer_reviews.author: Phil

customer_reviews.title: Not working out of the box.
customer_reviews.text: Just arrived this week and go to test the machine and does not work what so ever. The fan does not spin at all to blow bubbles. You would think they would test machines before putting them in the box. Update: The company has refunded me for the item, however it is very difficult to communicate. I have no idea if I need to return the item back to them or not.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: We were so disappointed in this machine
customer_reviews.text: We were so disappointed in this machine. We bought two of these for grandkids and relatives. The fan hardly worked at all on the first one and bubbles went about four feet. When elevated they blew right down in the grass. What a "bust"! When we opened the second machine, we noticed the fan was not even connected. Luckily we had not tried to use this one so we had the box to return it. Don't waste your money!
customer_reviews.author: Glenn P. Phillips

customer_reviews.title: I am going to be using this In April for ...
customer_reviews.text: I am going to be using this In April for my grand daughter's birthday partyso we hooked It up just to try It out and she had a BLAST!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Connie
